title: [Large-scale] Predictive Learning Analytics (PLA) Model Error Analysis and Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistics, understanding of machine learning models, and basic learning analytics concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course analyzing error cases of the PLA model and deriving improvement strategies in a project-based assessment environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Classify PLA model's False Negative (FN) and False Positive (FP) errors by context and explain their causes
Identify external factors (health, home environment, etc.) hindering learner behavior prediction and propose data source expansion plans
Error analysis can derive and implement improvement points for learning design (e.g., introducing prior knowledge assessment tools)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
